about_the_game:
Create your own custom towers by choosing and combining randomized upgrades. There is a near infinite amount of upgrade combinations available. Would you like your Ice Tower to shoot multiple projectiles at once? An anti-air tower that applies a burning effect? Lightning attacks that deal Splash damage and bounce from enemy to enemy? There are over 25 million possible combinations!

Choose between powerful perks, that have the potential to completely change your strategy. Meteors falling from the sky, an opportunity to reposition all your towers or exchanging gold for experience points? Pick the right perks, that synergize with your towers or deal with a weakness against a certain enemy.

Gradually unlock new talents to make your towers stronger and unlock new tower types, elements upgrades and strategies. Choose wisely and adapt your strategy to the challange or to your prefered playstyle.

Unleash the Chaos:

Features:

  • 30 unique levels with different environments, enemies and paths

  • Highly replayable building system, no two rounds of a level will ever be the same

  • Skilltree: Specialize in your favorite upgrades to tame the RNG and create the best possible builds

  • Full-fledged Fantasy Story

If you like my game dont forget to press the wishlist button!
